title: Cant get a S no matter what my score and damage dealt is
body:
why! i! just! cant! get! a! S!
got a score and damage dealt better than most of the teammates and all of them get S
EXCEPT ME
didnt get an S since start playing this game!

replies.body: You need a lot of farm and less deaths. Whenever I'm going for S's I play very safe, sit in lane and farm my ass off. When we have fights I also just poke and chill in the back.

Well, I'm looking at your match history, and I don't see anything S worthy in it.

I see a lot of feeding.  I see CS numbers that I routinely beat as a support, and I see a long list of losses.

Why are you expecting to get an S?
you need a very good cs to get s
i just got 2 S today ... lmao

Honestly S ranks often indicate that something went wrong, that one player was being greedy and wouldn't help the team. I've had many S+ ranks on my main Sion, but only a small few have been on winning games.
I just got one...... of many today XD
